title: Champ capsules SUCK
body: Just give level ups blue essence LOL

replies.body: That is what it is meant to give, considering you get tons of them..
But that removes the purpose of giving discounts on champions or free mastery as opposed to having to spend ~3-4k BE just for a purple/blue badge
Imagine how much it sucks when you own all the champs, so neither is good.
